education.title: B.S Computer Science
education.body2: Key Coursework: Human-Computer Interaction, Software Engineering, Network-Centric Computing, Computer Vision, Deep Learning

positions.title: Graduate Teaching Assistant
positions.body: Supervised daily labs and assistant students with their assignments on the NX 1946 CAD software, for the Graphical Communication and Spatial Analysis course.

positions.title: Full-Stack Software Engineer
positions.body: Worked in the Site Experience team. Major milestones: 90+ Google Lighthouse scores on non-paywalled pages; site-wide dark mode; custom Stale-While-Revalidate caching mechanism; Migration to new design system from legacy design; Admin Dashboard separation into Next.JS static app; Technical design reviewer.

positions.title: Technical Content Engineer
positions.body: Created 150+ interactive articles on various computer science concepts, algorithms, frameworks, libraries and technologies for Educative's 'Edpresso' platform.

positions.title: Undergraduate Teaching Assistant
positions.body: As part of the Introductory Computer Science course, created weekly coding assignments for students. Supervised weekly 3-hour lab sessions, oversaw and graded final course projects.

positions.title: Intern
positions.body: Learned basic web-development using HTML, CSS and Javascript in addition to Agile workflow.
